title: As ISA's approch pls share your all nighter tips and tricks

comments.body: Here's an all nighter tip - don't do all nighters. Start preparing early and get a good night's sleep before the ISA. Your body and mind will thank you.
caffiene pills, they do WONDERS, but maoe sure to get the right brand tho cuz some of em lowkey dont do shit
I would strongly advise against it. Caffeine pills can set you up for addiction and has absolutely no use case in a college setting.
Rowlet Bhai always to the rescue
